title: error 183 failed to create dump
body: In champion select. Almost every time. I can't play ranked normal at the end of the season and leave bronze, and i was so close. 92 LP Bronze 1 and THIS HAPPEN ! PLEASE RIOT HELP !!!{{champion:32}}

replies.body: Oh no!  Sorry this happened on such a crucial moment.  :(  This issue is very specific with an incompatible OS issue.  Your Windows might be running on 32-bit, but you may need to [upgrade to 64](https://www.windowscentral.com/how-upgrade-32-bit-64-bit-version-windows-10).  If that's not an option, you might need to restart your client before each game.
